name: Kultur Shock
description:
This game was made for the Beginners Circle #3 Jam, with the Theme being "A Different Planet". 

I decided to go it alone due to some unpredictable circumstances at the time meaning I wouldn't be able to guarentee to anyone that I could complete the game in Two weeks.

However, I am glad to say I was able to complete the Game in the allotted time. 

I had a alot of fun making this game, although in future I think I would rather work with a team, as having to juggle art, programming, design, and sound ended up meaning certain aspects of the project had to be rushed or left unfinished, and I was not able to implement all the features I otherwise would have been able to.

For example, every sound for this game was made in the five or so hour period before the submission deadline, and I still felt nervous about releasing the game as I couldn't be certain that all the bugs had been fixed. 

That being said, I am still happy with the work i've done, and I look forward to applying the many, many lessons I learnt whilst doing this project.

Special Thanks too:

Squid, who gave me a really good tip for sound design, allowing me to produce a bunch of sounds in a very short time. 

Everyone else on the Beginners Circle discord, Angry Smile has managed to foster a really nice community there.

Credit to Third Part Assets:
